entry.title: Top 25 Albums of 2014
entry.content:
Here are my top 25 albums of 2014, following up from my list of top 100 songs of the year.

Here’s to a great 2015. And expect Logesh’s list of top films of the year to come out soon.

Disappointments:
Tune-Yards - nikki nack
Jack White - Lazaretto
Foxygen - ...And Star Power
alt-j - All This Is Yours
Black Lips - Underneath the Rainbow

Honorable Mentions:
Angel Olsen - Burn Your Fire for No Witness
Owen Pallett - In Conflict
Ex Hex - Rips
The New Pornographers - Brill Bruisers
The Antlers - Familiars

And that last list:

25. Strand of Oaks - HEAL
24. Vince Staples - Hell Can Wait
23. Piñata - Freddie Gibbs & Madlib
22. FKA Twigs - LP1
21. Wye Oak - Shriek
20. Wild Beasts - Present Tense
19. Cloud Nothings - Here and Nowhere Else
18. Sun Kil Moon - Benji
17. Swans - To Be Kind
16. How To Dress Well - "What Is This Heart?"
15. Real Estate - Atlas
14. Shabazz Palaces - Lese Majesty
13. Aphex Twin - Syro
12. Sharon Van Etten - Are We There
11. Future Islands - Singles

10. Mr Twin Sister - Mr Twin Sister
9. Hundred Waters - The Moon Rang Like a Bell
8. Caribou - Our Love
7. The War on Drugs - Lost in The Dream
6. Flying Lotus - You're Dead!
5. Spoon - They Want My Soul
4. Mac Demarco - Salad Days
3. St. Vincent - St. Vincent
2. Run the Jewels - Run the Jewels 2
1. Todd Terje - It's Album Time

Happy 2015,

  • GPS

entry.title: Top 100 Songs of 2014
entry.content:
Rules: Song must be on a release this year, no more than 2 songs per artist. Also, if the track was used in last year’s list, it cannot make this year’s (IE: on an EP, now on a LP). Spotify playlist below. Let’s do this.

100. The Preatures – It Gets Better
99. Deers – Between Cans
98. First Aid Kit – My Silver Lining
97. Lana Del Rey – Brooklyn Baby
96. Arca – Thievery
95. Ariana Grande – Problem
94. Cloud Nothings – Psychic Trauma
93. Lone – 2 is 8
92. Saint Pepsi – Fiona Coyne
91. Viet Cong – Continental Shelf
90. Röyksopp & Robyn – Do It Again
89. The Wytches – Wire Frame Mattress
88. Dreamtrak – Contemporary
87. Ages and Ages – Divisionary (Do The Right Thing)
86. The Antlers – Palace
85. Rustie – Attak (feat. Danny Brown)
84. TOPS – Way to be Loved
83. EMA – So Blonde
82. How To Dress Well – Repeat Pleasure

80. Foxygen – How Can You Really?
79. Wye Oak – Glory
78. Ariel Pink – Put Your Number In My Phone

  • GPS
